PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12222022-11-17,  ,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActDivorce Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of Justice to Enter into an Agreement with the Government of the Northwest Territories
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Justice, on behalf of the Government of Canada, to ENTER INTO AN AGREEMENT with the Government of the NORTHWEST TERRITORIES in order to (1) designate the Northwest Territories’ Child Support Recalculation Service as a provincial child support service; and (2) authorize that service to recalculate child support amounts.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the Minister of Justice to Enter into an Agreement with the Government of the Northwest Territories
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Justice, on behalf of the Government of Canada, to ENTER INTO AN AGREEMENT with the Government of the NORTHWEST TERRITORIES in order to (1) designate the Northwest Territories’ Child Support Recalculation Service as a provincial child support service; and (2) authorize that service to recalculate child support amounts.
